name: Strawberries and Cream Taco Cup
author: Paula
summary: This dessert taco is simple enough for every day, but special enough for company. It goes a step beyond just ice cream topped with strawberries.
ingredients: ½ cup strawberries, hulled and sliced
1 teaspoon cinnamon sugar, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Stir strawberries and sugar together in a small bowl; set aside until needed
Place tortilla inside a small oven-proof bowl so that it forms a cup
Brush the inside of the tortilla with melted butter; lightly sprinkle with cinnamon sugar
Bake in the preheated oven until crisp, 10 to 12 minutes
Carefully remove from the bowl and cool on a wire rack
Meanwhile, place candy melts in a single layer on a saucer
Dip the top of the taco cup in the chocolate just so the edges are covered
Scoop ice cream into the taco cup
Top with strawberries and their juices
